actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: To amend section 3203(a)(1) of title 38, United States Code, to increase the amount of pension payable to a hospitalized veteran under this section from $60 to $75.

summary.text: Increases from $60 to $75 the monthly pension payable to a veteran having neither spouse nor child and being furnished domiciliary care by the Department of Veterans Affairs.

titles.title: To amend section 3203(a)(1) of title 38, United States Code, to increase the amount of pension payable to a hospitalized veteran under this section from $60 to $75.
